verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:14
verses.text: The sons of Manasseh; Ashriel, whom she bare: (but his concubine the Aramitess bare Machir the father of Gilead:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:15
verses.text: And Machir took to wife the sister of Huppim and Shuppim, whose sister’s name was Maachah;) and the name of the second was Zelophehad: and Zelophehad had daughters.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:16
verses.text: And Maachah the wife of Machir bare a son, and she called his name Peresh; and the name of his brother was Sheresh; and his sons were Ulam and Rakem.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:17
verses.text: And the sons of Ulam; Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh.
